Jamia Millia Islamia: Jamia Millia Islamia (Urdu: جامعہ ملّیہ اسلامیہ, abbreviated as JMI) is a premier central university located in New Delhi, India. Originally established at Aligarh, United Provinces (present-day Uttar Pradesh, India) during the British Empire in 1920, it moved to its current location in Okhla in 1935. It was given the deemed status by University Grants Commission in 1962. On 26 December 1988, it became a central university.
